overview: "Nhung Co Vo Hanh Dong”, a movie starring FAP TV, is about the world of 3 married couples. One day, the wifes discovered that their husbands were concealing secret love affairs. They decided not to stand the pain anymore and started a plan to expose their husbands. Will everything turn out to be the truth, or are there bigger lies.
title: Nhung Co Vo Hanh Dong
